serves.comment:
This serving size contains high amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.

Products made using this flour tend to be high in FODMAP. This is a gluten-free flour; while gluten-free flours tend to be low in FODMAPs, this flour is an exception.
serves.title: Один сервированный порции (2/3 чашки ингредиента муки)

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

Products made using this flour tend to be low in FODMAPs. However, it is important to note that other ingredients added during the food processing as well as the type of food processing used may increase the FODMAP content of the final product. Be sure that only other low FODMAP ingredients are added. To be confident of the final FODMAP content, the final product should be tested for total FODMAP content. This is a gluten-free flour which tend to be low in FODMAPs.
serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана мучной ингредиента)

serves.comment:
This serving size contains high amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.

Products made using this flour tend to be high in FODMAPs. This flour is a gluten-containing flour, which tend to be high in FODMAPs.
serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана ингредиента муки)

Products made using this flour tend to be high in FODMAP. This is a gluten-free flour; while gluten-free flours tend to be low in FODMAPs, this flour is an exception.
serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана мучной ингредиента)

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

Products made using this flour tend to be low in FODMAPs. However, it is important to note that other ingredients added during the food processing as well as the type of food processing used may increase the FODMAP content of the final product. Be sure that only other low FODMAP ingredients are added. To be confident of the final FODMAP content, the final product should be tested for total FODMAP content. This is a gluten-free flour which tend to be low in FODMAPs.
serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана ингредиента муки)

serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана муки в качестве ингредиента)

serves.comment:
This serving size contains high amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.

Products made using spelt flour without additional processing (pasta, spelt flakes, bread) tend to be high in FODMAPs. Additional processing that reduces the FODMAP content involves using the spelt flour in a traditional sourdough bread. Traditional sourdough bread involves a long fermentation of the dough using sourdough culture which further breaks down the FODMAPs. Sourdough spelt bread tends to be low in FODMAPs. To be confident of the final FODMAP content, the final product should be tested for total FODMAP content.
serves.title: 1 порция (⅔ стакана мучной ингредиента)

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

Products made using this flour tend to be low in FODMAPs. However, it is important to note that other ingredients added during the food processing as well as the type of food processing used may increase the FODMAP content of the final product. Be sure that only other low FODMAP ingredients are added. To be confident of the final FODMAP content, the final product should be tested for total FODMAP content. This is a gluten-free flour which tend to be low in FODMAPs.
